DOC.brief_summary: Atrial fibrillation common arrhythmia require electrical cardioversion many patient order regain sinus rhythm . In previous retrospective study complication acute renal failure find 17 % patient cardioversion . ( The incidence prognosis renal dysfunction follow cardioversion atrial fibrillation . Helman Y , ... Gilon D et al : Cardiology 2013 ; 124 ( 3 ) ; 184-9 . ) Another complication previously describe cardioversion pulmonary edema . In prospective study investigator aim evaluate risk acute renal failure post cardioversion . In addition investigator would like evaluate hemodynamic change , fluid balance sodium level patient post cardioversion potential mechanism acute renal failure pulmonary edema post cardioversion . In order ass hemodynamic change investigator use non-invasive FDA approve device call NICaS ( Non-Invasive Cardiac System ) . This system calculate cardiac output , cardiac index peripheral vascular resistance non-invasive , fast accurate way .
DOC.brief_title: Renal Function Post Cardioversion Atrial Fibrillation
